articles.title: China’s Xi warns of ‘interference’ as Australia brushes off anger - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Beijing says Asia-Pacific region must ‘resist external forces’ but Australia points to China’s own nuclear capabilities.
articles.content: Chinese President Xi Jinping has warned against interference from external forces in the region, as Australia shrugged off Beijings growing anger about its decision to acquire US nuclear-powered subm… [+4769 chars]
